articles.title: How Parkinson’s disease affects emotion recognition of voices
articles.description: A new study in Neurodegenerative Diseases looks closely at how Parkinson’s disease can affect something as everyday and essential as recognizing emotion in someone’s voice.

articles.title: Pakistan seeks UK support on Kashmir, Indus Waters Treaty amid India tensions
articles.description: ISLAMABAD: The head of an official delegation visiting world capitals to present Islamabad’s position following a recent military standoff with New Delhi met senior British officials and Kashmiri diaspora leaders in London this week, urging the UK to play a more active role in defusing tensions with India and restoring the suspended Indus Waters Treaty.

articles.title: This lifestyle factor is the biggest contributor to cognitive decline
articles.description: Scientists say one everyday choice casts a bigger shadow over brain function and the onset of cognitive decline than most people realize.
